entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 21 except 13 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 21 except 13 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Risk of thundershowers before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near noon. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
